title: [Kobold Village, Squirrel Pit]
description: The chamber is cloaked in mist, hot with the breath of hundreds of small, unwholesome lungs.  A single ghostly shaft of moonlight cuts downward, illuminating an awful panorama:  The roof of the hutch sags over a twenty foot earthen bowl, alive with the tiny bodies of infant rodents.  Sticks, fur, and scraps of refuse fill the bowl with a horrifying nest for the little beasts. Rabid from birth, their passionate cries pierce the shadows like shattering glass.

The chamber is cloaked in mist, hot with the breath of hundreds of small, unwholesome lungs.  A single yellow shaft of light cuts downward, illuminating an awful panorama:  The roof of the hutch sags over a twenty foot earthen bowl, alive with the tiny bodies of infant rodents.  Sticks, fur, and scraps of refuse fill the bowl with a horrifying nest for the little beasts.  Rabid from birth, their passionate cries pierce the shadows like shattering glass.
